sentences.sContent: In the conifer forest communities, the conifer pollen percentages are more than 60%, broadleaf are less than 10% while shrubs and herbs are less than 30%.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the conifer forest communities, the conifer pollen percentages are more than 60%, broadleaf are less than 10% while shrubs and herbs are less than 30%.
sentences.sCn: 在针叶林植被中， 针叶树种花粉百分比高于60%，阔叶树种花粉百分比低于10%，灌丛和草本花粉百分比低于30%。

sentences.sContent: In the broadleaf forest communities, the broadleaf pollen percentages are near 40%, the conifer are less than 15% while the shrubs and herbs are less than 50%.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the broadleaf forest communities, the broadleaf pollen percentages are near 40%, the conifer are less than 15% while the shrubs and herbs are less than 50%.
sentences.sCn: 在阔叶林植被中，阔叶树种花粉百分比约40%，针叶树种花粉百分比低于15%，灌丛和草本花粉百分比小于50%。

trans.tranOther: any tobacco plant having broad leaves, used esp in making cigars
